snippet: Some parents have banded together to show their displeasure with the emphasis on standardized exams in New York City schools by having their children boycott field tests.
abstract: Some New York City parents are having their children boycott field tests, used to determine which questions will appear on future state standardized exams, in an effort to show their displeasure with the city Education Department's emphasis on standardized tests.
lead_paragraph: Some parents have banded together to show their displeasure with the emphasis on standardized exams in New York City schools by having their children boycott field tests.

headline.seo: Dear Teacher, Johnny Isn’t Sick. He’s Just Boycotting the Test.
headline.main: Dear Teacher, Johnny Is Skipping the Test
headline.print_headline: Dear Teacher, Johnny Is Skipping the Test
